# 炼金术入门

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianjinshu-rumen
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianjinshu-rumen
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianjinshu-rumen
lianjinshu-rumen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianjinshu-rumen
lianjinshu-rumen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
